item.Q:
Write the character:
book; letter; same as 書經|书经 Book of History
item.A:
traditional: 書
shū
书记 (書記) shūji secretary; clerk

item.Q:
Write the character:
to ask; to let (sb do something); to cause (sb to do something); to have (sb do something); to yield; to allow; to permit
item.A:
traditional: 讓
ràng
让步 (讓步) ràngbù (make a) concession; to give in; to yield

sì
四人帮 (四人幫) sìrénbāng Gang of Four: Jiang Qing 江青, Zhang Chunqiao 張春橋, Yao Wenyuan 姚文元, Wang Hongwen 王洪文, who served as scapegoats for the excesses of the cultural revolution

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (a modal particle showing affirmation, approval, or consent)
2: oh (interjection)
3: an interjection; to express doubt or to question; to show realization; to stress
4: (interj.); ah
5: (interj. for surprise)
item.A: 1: a 2: à 3: á 4: ā 5: ǎ

item.Q:
Write the character:
to follow; from; it is for...to; reason; cause; because of; due to; to; to leave it (to sb); by (introduces passive verb)
item.A:
yóu
自由 zìyóu freedom; free; liberty

item.Q:
Write the character:
to choose; to pick; to select; to elect
item.A:
traditional: 選
xuǎn
选择 (選擇) xuǎnzé to select; to pick; choice

item.Q:
Write the character:
clear; distinct; compare; comparatively
item.A:
traditional: 較
jiào
比较 (比較) bǐjiào compare; contrast; fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: number; figure; to count; to calculate; several
2: to count
item.A:
traditional: 數
1: shù 2: shǔ
数量 (數量) shùliàng amount; quantity 倒数 (倒數) dàoshǔ (v) count down; count backward

item.Q:
Write the character: shū

traditional: 書

item.Q:

to ask; to let (sb do something); to cause (sb to do something); to have (sb do something); to yield; to allow; to permit

four; 4

(interj.); ah

to follow; from; it is for...to; reason; cause; because of; due to; to; to leave it (to sb); by (introduces passive verb)

item.Q:

item.Q:
Write the character: shǔ
(dàoshǔ de shǔ)
item.A:
traditional: 數
to count
倒数 (倒數) dàoshǔ (v) count down; count backward

traditional: 上書
shàngshū to write a letter (to the authorities); to present a petition

traditional: 但書
dànshū proviso; qualifying clause

traditional: 國書
guóshū national or dynastic history book

traditional: 情書
qíngshū love letter

traditional: 手書
shǒushū hand-written

traditional: 教書
jiāoshū to teach (in a school)

traditional: 教科書
jiàokēshū textbook

traditional: 文書
wénshū document; official correspondence; secretary; secretariat

traditional: 新書
xīnshū new book

traditional: 書信
shūxìn a letter; an epistle (in the bible)

traditional: 書名
shūmíng name of a book; reputation as calligrapher

traditional: 書本
shūběn book

traditional: 書法
shūfǎ calligraphy; penmanship

traditional: 書經
shūjīng Book of History; a compendium of documents in various styles, making up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the times of Confucius; also called 尚書經|尚书经 or 尚書|尚书 or 書|书

traditional: 書面
shūmiàn in writing; written (guarantee etc)

traditional: 經書
jīngshū classic books in Confucianism; scriptures; sutras

traditional: 說明書
shuōmíngshū (technical) manual; (book of) directions; synopsis (of a play or film)

traditional: 出讓
chūràng remise

traditional: 讓位
ràngwèi to abdicate; to yield

traditional: 讓開
ràngkai to get out of the way
ràngkāi to get out of the way; to step aside

traditional: 四國
Sìguó Shikoku (one of the four main islands of Japan)
sìguó four countries
sìfāng four-way; four-sided

traditional: 四書
sìshū Four Books - namely the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
sìqǐ to spring up everywhere; from all around
sìmiàn all sides

traditional: 四面體
sìmiàntǐ tetrahedron
bùyóudé can't help; cannot but
bùyóuzìzhǔ can't help; involuntarily
shìyóu purpose; subject (of a business letter); job; work
lǐyóu reason; ground(s); justification

traditional: 由來
yóulái origin
yóucǐ hereby; from this

traditional: 由此可見
yóucǐkějiàn from this, it can be seen that...

traditional: 經由
jīngyóu via
zìyóu freedom; free; liberty
zìyóumín freedman
zìyóuzìzài carefree; free and easy; leisurely

traditional: 中選
zhòngxuǎn to win an election; to get a position by passing the imperial exam

traditional: 人選
rénxuǎn person selected (for a job etc)

traditional: 大選
dàxuǎn general election

traditional: 文選
wénxuǎn a compilation; selected works

traditional: 民選
mínxuǎn democratically elected

traditional: 當選
dāngxuǎn be elected

traditional: 選區
xuǎnqū electoral district

traditional: 選定
xuǎndìng to pick out; to select; chosen and fixed

traditional: 選手
xuǎnshǒu athlete; contestant

traditional: 選民
xuǎnmín voter

traditional: 比較
bǐjiào compare; contrast; fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather

traditional: 較為
jiàowéi to be comparatively

traditional: 不名數
bùmíngshù abstract number

traditional: 中位數
zhōngwèishù median

traditional: 全數
quánshù the entire sum; the whole amount

traditional: 分數
fēnshù fraction; score

traditional: 加數
jīashù addend

traditional: 多位數
duōwèishù multidigit number

traditional: 多數
duōshù majority; most

traditional: 大多數
dàduōshù (great) majority

traditional: 大數
Dàshù Tarsus, Mediterranean city in Turkey, the birthplace of St Paul
dàshù a large number

traditional: 實數
shíshù real number

traditional: 對數
duìshù logarithm

traditional: 對數方程
duìshùfāngchéng logarithmic equation

traditional: 小數
xiǎoshù (n) decimal; decimal value

traditional: 小數點
xiǎoshùdiǎn (n) decimal point

traditional: 少數
shǎoshù small number; few; minority

traditional: 常數
chángshù a constant (math.)

traditional: 心中有數
xīnzhōngyǒushù to know what's going on

traditional: 數位
shùwèi digital

traditional: 數學
shùxué mathematics; mathematical

traditional: 數論
shùlùn (math.) number theory

traditional: 次數
cìshù frequency; number of times; ordinal number

traditional: 正數
zhèngshù a positive number

traditional: 無數
wúshù countless; numberless; innumerable

traditional: 自然數
zìránshù natural number

traditional: 被加數
bèijīashù augend

traditional: 被開方數
bèikāifāngshù radicand
